# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted and offers unparalleled value in its category. Given its unique features and the quality it boasts, we believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. We're offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $9,500, which we believe strikes a fair balance between the value it provides and the investment you're making. We're confident that you'll find its benefits to be well worth the cost. Should you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
